citations.narrative:
I was notified by the licensee via email that she had moved on Nov. 24th. I contacted her on a few occasions via phone,
email and USPS to inform her that she needed to cancel this license and apply for a new license in the state in which she
moved. I also provided a voluntary surrender form on multiple occasions. A licensee must notify the office no fewer than
90 days before a change in address occurs. Correct by 20 Jan. 2023.

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on 12 Jan.
2023.
End Section

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
I was notified by the licensee via email that she had moved on Nov. 24th.  I contacted her on a few occasions via phone, 
email and USPS to inform her that she needed to cancel this license and apply for a new license in the state in which she 
moved.  I also provided a voluntary surrender form on multiple occasions.  A licensee must notify the office no fewer than 
90 days before a change in address occurs.  Correct by 20 Jan. 2023. 
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on 12 Jan. 
2023. 
 
 
 
End Section
